summary: Premium cinematic photography portfolio website for UC Photography & Film's with dark luxury theme (Black/Gold/White), featuring hero section, services showcase, portfolio gallery with filters, client reviews, booking CTAs, WhatsApp integration, and contact form. Fully responsive with smooth animations and SEO optimization.
architectural_notes: Single-page website with smooth scrolling navigation
Dark theme design system: Black background, Gold accents (#D4AF37), White text
Responsive breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop
WhatsApp integration with pre-filled message template
Lightbox library for portfolio image preview
SEO meta tags and structured data for local photography business
Updated Google Maps embed location to https://maps.app.goo.gl/QQiBrzdgXYFc5u6h9 (replacing previous location)
Google Maps link updated to https://maps.google.com/?q=25.039202,73.912804 with exact coordinates 25.039202,73.912804

existing_features.title: Create sticky header with transparent background, logo text 'UC Photography & Film's', navigation menu (Home, Portfolio, Services, About, Reviews, Contact, Book Now), Instagram icon, and highlighted Book Now button

Create full-screen hero section with cinematic background image, heading 'Capturing Moments, Creating Forever Memories', subheading 'Professional Wedding, Event & Promotion Photography', WhatsApp CTA button labeled 'Book Now on WhatsApp', and smooth fade-in animation

Create services section with six premium cards displaying Wedding Photography, Pre-Wedding Shoot, Event Photography, Promotion & Brand Shoot, Birthday & Function Shoot, and Cinematic Films & Videos, each with icons, images, and hover animations
Create portfolio gallery section with grid layout, category filters (Wedding, Events, Promotion, Functions, Cinematic), image hover zoom effect, and lightbox preview functionality

Create about section with photographer introduction text 'Welcome to UC Photography & Film's — where moments become timeless memories. We specialize in wedding photography, cinematic films, event coverage, promotion shoots, and all types of special functions. Our passion is to capture emotions and real moments creatively.' and placeholder for photographer image
Create client reviews section with testimonial cards, star rating design, and smooth sliding animation
Create booking CTA section with text 'Limited Bookings Available — Reserve Your Date Today' and 'Book on WhatsApp' button
Create contact section with click-to-call phone number, contact form (Name, Phone, Message fields), studio location placeholder, WhatsApp contact button, and Instagram link
Create floating WhatsApp icon fixed at bottom-right corner that opens WhatsApp chat with pre-filled message 'Hello UC Photography & Film's, I want to know about photography booking.'
Create footer with logo, quick links to all sections, phone number, WhatsApp icon, Instagram icon, and copyright text '© UC Photography & Film's'

Implement modern typography, smooth animations and transitions throughout the website with cinematic feel
